name: stench

effect.ruby_sapphire: This Pokémon's damaging moves have a 10% chance to make the target flinch with each hit if they do not already cause flinching as a secondary effect. This ability does not stack with a held item. Overworld: The wild encounter rate is halved while this Pokémon is first in the party.

short_effect: Has a 10% chance of making target Pokémon flinch with each hit.
